fullText: Daniel Craig and Ruth Negga bring fresh interpretations to Shakespeare's Scottish play in this intimate Longacre Theatre production that makes the familiar feel newly urgent.
dtliExcerpt: Daniel Craig and Ruth Negga bring fresh interpretations to Shakespeare's Scottish play in this intimate Longacre Theatre production that makes the familiar feel newly urgent.
